extension.summary: Install iCanuck's Kodi Skins/Addons
extension.description: Download and install Kodi Skins and Addons by iCanuck and others.

extension.description: Download and install Kodi Skins and beta Addons by iCanuck.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, June 2007

extension.summary: tvOS-X extra Images
extension.description: tvOS-X extra Images

extension.summary: tvOS GUI sounds
extension.description: tvOS GUI sounds

extension.summary: [COLOR green]Enable ALL Kodi 17 Add-ons[/COLOR]
extension.description: Kodi 17 Krypton no longer automatically Enables your Add-ons when manually copying the folders. Add-on Enabler will Enable ALL your Add-ons at the Click of a Button
extension.disclaimer: [COLOR red]If using Windows this Add-on will Enable ALL PVR Add-ons[/COLOR]

extension.summary: ExtendedInfo Script
extension.description: This script offers various possibilities to display online content inside skins as well as a complete MovieDB browser including info dialogs for various media types. Used services are themoviedb.org, theaudiodb.org, Trakt.TV, omdbapi.com and a lot more. Needs skin implementation for lot of functions.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2, June 1991
extension.news: Fix support for Kodi L* nightlies[CR]Browser window improvements[CR]Fixes for TADB/LastFM

extension.summary: Helper service for Kodi skins
extension.description: Helper service for Kodi skins

extension.summary: Ready to use widgets for all kind of media types

extension.description: Добавка за облици, която осигурява просто управление и списък с потребителски преки пътища (изисква поддръжка от облика)
Add-on für Skins für einfache Bearbeitung und Auflistung von benutzerdefinierten Verknüpfungen (erfordert Skin-Unterstützung)
Πρόσθετο για κελύφη, το οποίο παρέχει έναν απλό τρόπο διαχείρισης και κατηγοριοποίησης των συντομεύσεων του χρήστη (πρέπει να υποστηρίζεται από το κέλυφος)
Add-on for skins to provide simple managing and listing of user shortcuts (requires skin support)
Add-on for skins to provide simple managing and listing of user shortcuts (requires skin support)
Add-on for skins to provide simple managing and listing of user shortcuts (requires skin support)
Complemento para las pieles para proporcionar una gestión sencilla y lista de atajos de usuario (requiere que la piel lo soporte)
Addiciel pour habillages qui fournit une gestion simple et un listage des raccourcis utilisateurs (exige la prise en charge de l'habillage)
Complemento que fornece aos temas dunha xestión sinxela dos atallos dos usuarios (require soporte do tema)
Dodatak za presvlake koja omogućava jednostavno upravljanje i prikaz korisnikovih prečaca (zahtijeva podršku presvlake)
Felszín kiegészítő amely könnyen kezelhetővé és listázhatóvá teszi a felhasználói parancsikonokat (Felszín támogatás szükséges)
Viðbót fyrir viðmót til að halda utan um flýtivísa og fá yfirlit yfir þá (þarfnast stuðnings frá viðmóti)
Add-on per gli skin per consentire un facile gestione ed elenco delle scorciatoie utente (richiede che lo skin lo supporti)
Priedas teminėms išvaizdoms, kad jos turėtų galimybę paprastai tvarkyti ir atvaizduoti vartotojo sukurtas nuorodas (reikalingas teminės išvaizdos palaikymas)
Add-on voor skins om te voorzien in het eenvoudig beheren en sorteren van gebruikers snelkoppelingen (vereist skin ondersteuning)
Tillegg for enkel administrering og opplisting av bruker-snarveier i tema (krever støtte i tema)
Wtyczka dla skór, która zapewnia proste zarządzanie i tworzenie list skrótów użytkownika (wymaga wsparcia skóry)
Um add-on que permite que os temas tenham recursos simples para gerir e listar atalhos de utilizadores (é necessário suporte do tema)
Add-on para que as skins possam prover gerenciamento de lista de atalhos para o menu principal (requer suporte da skin)
Дополнение для обложек, предоставляющее простой способ управления и список пользовательских ярлыков (требуется поддержка обложкой)
Skinntillägg som tillhandahåller enkel hantering och översikt av användargenvägar (om skinnet stöder det)
插件为皮肤提供了简单的管理和用户连接方式列表 (需要皮肤支持)

extension.summary: Speedtest
extension.description: Speedtest hosted by Ookla Speedtest

extension.summary: Browse movies and episodes in a variety of sorted playlists.
extension.description: Plugin for skins to provide library data throughout the skin. It can also be used as standalone plugin to browse the playlists in the video library.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2, June 1991

extension.description: Bello е потребителски интерфейс за Kodi. Целта му е да Ви удовлетвори в максимална степен, чрез своя уникален, бърз и удобен интерфейс, като същевременно не Ви лишава от най-новите функционалности на Kodi.

Bello ist eine Benutzeroberfläche für das Kodi Media Center. Das Ziel von Bello ist es, Ihr Unterhaltungserlebnis mit der schnellen, einzigartigen und einheitlichen Oberfläche zusammen mit den neusten Kodi-Features zu maximieren.

Το Bello είναι ένα Γραφικό Περιβάλλον Εργασίας (GUI) για το Κέντρο Πολυμέσων Kodi. Στόχος του Bello είναι να μεγιστοποιήσει την ψυχαγωγική σας εμπειρία μέσω του γρήγορου, μοναδικού και ενοποιημένου περιβάλλοντός του, που περιλαμβάνει όλες τις νέες λειτουργίες του Kodi.

This is the 6th generation of Bello skin for Kodi. Bello 6 is aiming to maximize your Kodi entertainment experience with its NEW Unique, Clean and Elegant interface while providing users a highly customization level and lots of cool features!

This is the 6th generation of Bello skin for Kodi. Bello 6 is aiming to maximize your Kodi entertainment experience with its NEW Unique, Clean and Elegant interface while providing users a highly customization level and lots of cool features!

This is the 6th generation of Bello skin for Kodi. Bello 6 is aiming to maximize your Kodi entertainment experience with its NEW Unique, Clean and Elegant interface while providing users a highly customization level and lots of cool features!

This is the 6th generation of Bello skin for Kodi. Bello 6 is aiming to maximize your Kodi entertainment experience with its NEW Unique, Clean and Elegant interface while providing users a highly customization level and lots of cool features!
Bello es una interfaz gráfica para Kodi. La meta de Bello es maximizar la experiencia de Kodi con su interfaz única, rápida y unificada y las últimas novedades de Kodi.
Bello est un thème pour Kodi Media Center. Le but de Bello est de maximiser votre expérience Kodi avec son interface rapide, fluide et unique pour toutes les fonctionnalités d'Kodi.

Bello est une IUG pour le centre multimédia Kodi. Le but de Bello est de maximiser votre expérience de divertissement Kodi avec une interface rapide, unique et unifiée, ainsi qu'avec toutes les dernières fonctions de Kodi.
Bello e unha GUI para o Centro Multimedia Kodi. O obxectivo de Bello é que goce ó máximo da experiencia en entretemento no Kodi, unha interface única e unificada xunto con todas as funcións do Kodi.
המעטפת Bello היא ממשק משתמש עבור Kodi. מטרת Bello היא להעצים את חוויית השימוש ב־Kodi בעזרת ממשק מהיר, ייחודי ואחיד עם כל היכולות החדשות של Kodi.
A Bello egy felszín az Kodi média centerhez. A Bello célja hogy maximalizálja az Kodi élvezeti értékét az egyedi, gyors és egyszerű felülettel és az Kodi legújabb fejlesztéseinek felhasználásával.

Bello è un'interfaccia per Kodi Media Center. L'obiettivo di Bello è di massimizzare la tua esperienza di intrattenimento con Kodi con la sua interfaccia veloce, unica ed unificata insieme alle nuove caratteristiche di Kodi.
Bello는 Kodi Media Center의 그래픽 인터페이스입니다. Bello의 목표는 모든 최신 기능들에 대해 빠르고 독특하며 일관된 인터페이스를 제공하여 Kodi 엔터테인먼트 경험을 최대화하는데 있습니다.
Bello Kodi Media Center GUI. Bello tikslas yra maksimaliai padidinti Kodi pramogą, unikali ir vieninga sąsaja kartu su visomis naujausiomis Kodi funkcijomis.
Bello ialah GUI untuk Pusat Media Kodi. Matlamat Bello ialah untuk pengalaman hiburan Kodi yang maksimum dengan antaramuka yang pantas, unik dan sepadu bersama-sama dengan semua fitur terkini Kodi.

Bello is een gebruikersinterface voor Kodi Media Center. Het doel van Bello is jouw Kodi entertainmentbeleving te maximaliseren met zijn snelle, unieke en universele interface samen met de laatste mogelijkheden van Kodi

Bello to graficzny interfejs użytkownika dla Kodi Media Center. Celem Bello jest dostarczenie maksymalnej wygody użytkowania Kodi z wykorzystaniem szybkiego, unikalnego oraz ujednoliconego interfejsu, wraz z wszystkimi najnowszymi funkcjonalnościami Kodi.

Bello é uma interface gráfica para o Kodi. A meta de Bello é maximizar sua experiência de entretenimento com o Kodi através de sua interface única, rápida e integrada com todos os últimos recursos do Kodi.
Bello - это обложка для Kodi. Ee быстрый, неповторимый и законченный интерфейс вместе возможностями Kodi позволят вам получить максимальное удовольствие от вашей цифровой коллекции.
Bello är ett GUI för Kodi Media Center. Syftet med Bello är att fullborda din Kodi upplevelse med ett snabbt, unikt och samlat gränssnitt tillsammans med de allra senaste funktionerna av Kodi.
Bello, Kodi Media Center için bir GKA'dır. Bello'nun hedefi, hızlı ve benzersiz arayüzüyle, Kodi eğlence deneyiminizi en son ve bütün özellikleriyle maksimuma çıkarmaktır.
Bello是一个Kodi媒体中心的图形界面. Bello的目标是通过快速, 独特和统一的界面以及最新的Kodi特性, 来最大化你的Kodi娱乐体验.
extension.disclaimer: Ползването на мишка не се поддържа
L'ús del ratolí no està suportat
Verwendung der Maus wird nicht unterstützt
El uso de ratón no esta soportado
L'utilisation de la souris n'est pas supportée.
L'utilisation de la souris n'est pas prise en charge
L'utilizzo del mouse non è supportato
Користењето на глувче не е поддржано
Het gebruik van een muis wordt niet ondersteund
Não é possível utilizar o rato
Uso de mouse não é suportado
ไม่รองรับการใช้งานด้วยเมาท์
extension.license: Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-Share Alike 4.0 International License
extension.news: For a full list of changes visit https://github.com/Nessus85100/Bello.6/commits/master

extension.description: If you like Apple "everything at hand" policy for interfaces, You might want to give this Skin a try. I designed it trying to put as few clicks as possible between You and what You're trying to do (or watch ;)
